Sia

Korean: 시아

Country:

South Korea

Group (2022-present):
NTORE until Oct 17, 2023

Introduction

Sia (시아) is a South Korean singer. She was a member of the girl group NTORE. She joined the group in August 2023 and graduated on October 17, 2023.
